GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.25 to before v5.16.5
GSD.description:
ARM: 9170/1: fix panic when kasan and kprobe are enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.5 by commit ba1863be105b06e10d0e2f6b1b8a0570801cfc71, it was introduced in version v2.6.25 by commit 35aa1df4328340f38edc46f00837f08d33d49f63. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: 9170/1: fix panic when kasan and kprobe are enabled
